Protocol Team","details":"This contract implements health checks for lending positions by comparing the value      of a user's collateral against their borrowed amount and the loan-to-value (LTV) ratio.      It prevents users from borrowing more than their collateral can safely support. Key Features: - Multi-token collateral support across different chains - Real-time price feed integration via TokenDataStream - Configurable loan-to-value ratios per token - Automatic liquidation threshold detection - Precision handling for different token decimals","errors":{"InvalidLtv(address,uint256)":[{"params":{"ltv":"The invalid LTV ratio that was provided"}}],"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}]},"kind":"dev","methods":{"constructor":{"details":"Sets up Ownable with deployer as owner and configures the factory"},"isHealthy(address,address)":{"details":"Calculates the total USD value of user's collateral across all supported tokens      and compares it against their borrowed amount and the liquidation threshold.      Reverts if the position is unhealthy (over-leveraged).","params":{"_router":"The lending pool contract address","_user":"The user address whose position is being checked"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"setFactory(address)":{"details":"Only the contract owner can call this function","params":{"_factory":"The new factory contract address"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."}},"stateVariables":{"liquidationBonus":{"details":"router address => liquidation bonus (e.g., 0.05e18 = 5% bonus to liquidator) Liquidators receive collateral worth (debt repaid * (1 + bonus))"},"liquidationThreshold":{"details":"lendingPool address => liquidation threshold (e.g., 0.85e18 = 85%) When health factor drops below this, position can be liquidated"}},"title":"IsHealthy","version":1},"userdoc":{"errors":{"InvalidLtv(address,uint256)":[{"notice":"Thrown when an invalid loan-to-value ratio is provided (e.g., constructor.details: Sets up Ownable with deployer as owner and configures the factory

isHealthy(address,address).details: Calculates the total USD value of user's collateral across all supported tokens      and compares it against their borrowed amount and the liquidation threshold.      Reverts if the position is unhealthy (over-leveraged).

params._user: The user address whose position is being checked

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setFactory(address).details: Only the contract owner can call this function

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

constructor.notice: Initializes the IsHealthy contract with a factory address

factory().notice: Address of the Factory contract for accessing protocol configurations

isHealthy(address,address).notice: Validates whether a user's borrowing position is healthy

liquidationBonus(address).notice: Liquidation bonus for each collateral token (with 18 decimals precision)

liquidationThreshold(address).notice: Liquidation threshold for each collateral token (with 18 decimals precision)
